ModMetaData.name: ED-Vehicles
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
WORK IN PROGRESS, This module is at an Alpha Stage. It shouldn't crash the game (any more), but is still very much a work in progress, so feel free to try it and let me know what you think and what direction you think it should go it.
Requires: ED-Core Work in Progress, May eventually add Vehicles.
